data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 5, Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Fortaleza Palmeiras attack through Raphael Veiga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza's Osvaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Ronald for Fortaleza drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras drive upfield and Raphael Veiga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
In the minute 17, Fortaleza pushes forward through Ronald, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 19, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Palmeiras's Gustavo Gomez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Fortaleza.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Fortaleza.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar misses with an attempt on goal.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 30, Raphael Veiga of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, David is on target to give Fortaleza a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Ronald.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Patrick de Paula for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Goal! David extends Fortaleza's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 43, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tinga.
Fortalezaâ€™s Tinga is on his feet again at Estadio Castelao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gustavo Gomez for Palmeiras is whistled offside.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza's Bruno Melo has been booked in Fortaleza and will miss the next match through suspension.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Wesley is replacing Mayke for the away team.
In the minute 46, Willian is on a sub for Patrick de Paula for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Willian's finish is wide of the goal.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Paulao (Fortaleza) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 53, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Fortaleza's area.
Palmeiras push forward at Estadio Castelao and Luiz Adriano gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Fortaleza defence.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 54, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 56, Tinga of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique waits before resuming play because Tinga for Fortaleza is still down.
In the minute 57, Tinga (Fortaleza) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Gabriel Dias.
Rogerio Ceni (Fortaleza) is making a second substitution, with Romarinho replacing Ronald.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick Fortaleza.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ze Rafael for Palmeiras has been booked by Marcelo De Lima Henrique and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
The home team have replaced Osvaldo with Carlinhos. This is the third substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Fortaleza.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Raphael Veiga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 71, Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Palmeiras's Wesley gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 76, Gabriel Dias's header is off-target for Fortaleza.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Juninho is replacing Yuri Cesar for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza make their fifth substitution with Wellington Paulista replacing David.
In the minute 78, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
The away team replace Luiz Adriano with Gabriel Veron.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Danilo is on a sub for Raphael Veiga for Palmeiras.
In the minute 80, Palmeiras's Wesley breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Palmeiras.
Matias Vina (Palmeiras) has received a yellow card from Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Max Walef is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Wesley (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Free kick Fortaleza.
In the minute 89, Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fortaleza's half?
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Palmeiras.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Max Walef has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Carlinhos of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Palmeiras's Gustavo Gomez has been booked in Fortaleza.
Gustavo Gomez Palmeiras.
